simworldobjects
Class SimRCX

java.lang.Object
  simworldobjects.BasicSimObject
      simworldobjects.SimRCX
All Implemented Interfaces:
AbstractRobot, SimObject
public class SimRCX
extends BasicSimObject
implements AbstractRobot

Simulates an RCX for use in SimWorld

Author:
Graham Ritchie
